name: Driving School 3D Parking
description:
In Driving School 3D Parking you need to check your mirrors and take a good seat in your drivers seat. So you can get ready to put your driving abilities to the test, show your skills on the 3D parking lot. Be careful that you don't bump into any cars, trucks, bus and and other vehicles that are parked there as well. Driving School 3D Parking is one of the first driving simulator games to deliver a true life driving school 3D parking experience. Players will take part in levels with challenges where they need to show how to react on natural obstacles, like cars, road curves and more. This game includes a wide variety of different cars for you to drive around with. You can drive sports cars, SUV’s and normal sedans. Yeah this newest Driving school 3D parking game is a true to life automotive driving school simulator with nice prestigious cars from all over the world.


So adjust your camera view if need to make the precision parking move sometimes needed to get into the spot. The way the game goes is that you start out with only one car in your garage, which you can use for your first levels. As you move through the game you will earn more cash that you can use to buy more car. Most 3D parking games simulator offer a small amount of cars not Driving School 3D parking, no sir in this awesome game you get to drive around 20 different cars. So start earning cash, with the challenges, why you may ask, Because without cash, you can’t buy any of the game’s numerous cars or visible upgrades. and of course building up a car collection is fun to do as well.


Driving School 3D Parking game features:
- 20 different vehicles, sport cars, trucks, SUV’s and sedans
- Amazing area’s with stunning 3D graphics so you will have a realistic driving school simulator environment
- Damage system, don't bump into any other cars
- Two different area’s with both 25 levels each so that makes 50 levels total


If you’re the sort of 3D parking games fan who’s becomes bored with the massive amount of bad parking simulator games on the market. And are you looking for the best parking games in the world. Well then look no further, Driving School 3D Parking has everything you would look for in a 3D parking cars game!
